CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 6, 1945, pg. 21, reads: "Gay Holiday Celebration - Mrs. Evelyn Dothard and Mrs. Beatrice Parker, assisted by Mrs. George Greenlee, were hostesses to a group of friends during the holidays. Guests present were, left to right: Mrs. Charlesetta Primas, Mrs. and Mrs. Hale, Mr. Stuart, Lt. and Mrs. Brown of Philadelphia and Mrs. Evelyn Dothard. Back row: Mrs. George Greenlee, Mrs. Beatrice Parker, Mrs. Marie Thomas and Robert King, formerly of W. Va. State college. Seated: Mrs. Harry Fitzgerald and Mrs. Juanita Russell. Guests not shown in the picture were Alderman Harry Fitzgerald, Dr. J. A. Randall and Mr. Smith, of Clairton, Pa."
TitMainTitle: Guests at party, including seated from left: Mrs. Harry Fitzgerald, Juanita Russell; standing: Charlesetta Primas, Mr. Hale, Mrs. Hale, Mr. Stuart, Lt. Brown wearing Army uniform, Mrs. Brown, Evelyn Dothard; back row: Georgia Greenlee, Beatrice Parker, Marie Thomas and Robert King posed on and in front of stairs in home
